sentences.en: Determination of rumen microbial - nitrogen of sheep using urinary excretion of purine derivatives was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了用绵羊尿中嘌呤衍生物估测瘤胃微生物氮.

sentences.en: DM and DNF degradability in rumen at 48 h were increased with more addition of poultry litter.
sentences.cn: 加大鸡粪添加量能明显提高玉米黄贮瘤胃48h干物质、中性洗涤纤维降解率.

sentences.en: Effects of Added Nonprotein Nitrogen on Microbial Protein Synthesis in Rumen of Buffalo.
sentences.cn: 添加非蛋白氮对水牛瘤胃微生物蛋白合成的影响.

sentences.en: Goats use rumen, reticulum and omasum to digest silage.
sentences.cn: 羊也是利用瘤胃 、 蜂巢胃、重瓣胃来消化草料(刍料).

sentences.en: Grazing animals do it through the celluloses generated by the microorganisms of their rumen.
sentences.cn: 食草动物利用它们瘤胃中微生物所产生的纤维素酶来水解纤维素。

sentences.en: In order to develop ferment functional of rumen, researchers focus on the study on microbial ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 为了充分发挥瘤胃的发酵功能, 研究人员一直致力于瘤胃微生态的研究.

sentences.en: Mimosine could be changed into another toxin 3 - hydroxy - ( 1 H ) pyridone ( DHP ) in the rumen.
sentences.cn: 含羞草素可在反刍家畜瘤胃内转变为另一毒素 3- 羟基 -4 ( 1氢 ) 吡啶酮 ( DHP ).

sentences.en: Relatively, rumen fungi had a less number and slower growth rate compared with rumen bacteria.
sentences.cn: 瘤胃微生物区系主要由瘤胃细菌 、 古菌、原虫和真菌组成.

sentences.en: Rumen microbes, include bacteria, mycetes and protozoans, thereinto , rumen bacteria and rumen mycetes could generate cellulase.
sentences.cn: 瘤胃微生物主要包括细菌 、 菌和原生动物.

sentences.en: The DCC method was used to study the rumen bacteria of water buffalo.
sentences.cn: 本试验应用DCC法对水牛瘤胃细菌进行测定。

sentences.en: The first two, known as the rumen , are essentially incubation chambers teeming with bacteria and protozoa.
sentences.cn: 头两个胃称为瘤胃, 实际是充满了细菌与原生动物的大型培养室.

sentences.en: They will generally consume all but the hide, some of the large bones and skull and the rumen (stomach contents of ungulates) of their prey.
sentences.cn: 他们通常会吃光食物，但是也会把一些大的骨头，头盖骨，以及胃什么的藏起来。

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]瘤胃（反刍动物的第一胃）

trans.tran_cn: 瘤胃（反刍动物的第一胃）
trans.tran_en: the first compartment of the stomach of ruminants, behind the reticulum, in which food is partly digested before being regurgitated as cud
